==Useful Info==
The '''quokka''' (''[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quokka Setonix brachyurus]'') is a small marsupial that's a step up from the common [[List of rats|rat]]. They can be found on the first few floors of [[the Dungeon]], and are the best result from [[Summon Small Mammal]].

==Tips & Tricks==
*Quokkas are one of the more dangerous enemies you can find on D:1. As they are fast, quokkas occasionally move twice for every player turn. Don't be afraid to use your [[background]]'s starting consumable if combat goes poorly.
*Outside of D:1-2, quokkas are unlikely to be a serious threat.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], quokkas could not spawn on D:1.
*Prior to [[0.14]], quokkas had speed 10.
